attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: mephedrone has infected our young and theres more on its way lets stop it and things like it in its tracks now. legalize all drugs under a doctors prescription/counciling /age restrictions and dna marking of drugs to trace dealing to others than prescribed .freeing masses of resorces and saving the country billions.let alone ending afgan war by employing the country to supply.stopping the young from being infected.fighting it is not working world wide its just allowing our young to be infected.take the money out of it and pay the national debit with it and ensure the safty of our young.securing future and making almost drug free generations.improve society finacially and socially even improving the lifes of users.i just need 10 minutes to prove it will work.or more than a 1000 words.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
